EmailTemplate.name: Join Sentinel and Turbonomic for an incredible event! (1493322205.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Sentinel and Turbonomic for an incredible event! (1493322205.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 98 Clean false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Please join Sentinel and Turbonomic (formerly VMTurbo) on May 11 @ 2pm for an exciting afternoon at Barrack’s 616 Pistol and rifle range. We invite you to hear about Turbonomic’s Autonomic Platform and why over 2,000 companies have chosen Turbonomic’s real-time, self-managing platform to increase performance of their applications while maximizing the efficiency of their virtual and cloud infrastructures. https://turbonomic.com/turbonomic-sentinel-barrack-616/ <[[https://turbonomic.com/turbonomic-sentinel-barrack-616/]]> Turbonomic Introduction from 2:00 – 2:30 at Barracks 616Range time from 2:30-4:30 at Barracks 616Happy Hour 4:30 – 5:30 at Gippers Barrack’s 6165740 Foremost Dr Grand Rapids MI 49546 Gippers2929 Kraft AveGrand Rapids, Mi 49546 We look forward to seeing you there. Katie NorchiSales Development RepresentativeO: 857.305.4618 C: 440.708.8477500 Boylston Street, Boston, MA 02116
